headline.main: FREE FRENCH HAIL LEASE-LEND GRANT; Fear Platon's North African Tour Spells Purge and Say Gestapo Agents Are There

lead_paragraph: DAMASCUS, Syria, Nov. 26 -- Free French reaction to the Washington decision to grant lease-lend aid to General Charles de Gaulle's forces Is marked by satisfaction. At the same time, had a further step been taken and General de Gaulle's National Committee officially recognized de facto there would have been jubilation.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
